channel.title: What We Donate on Project HAPPIE
channel.description: Recent content in What We Donate on Project HAPPIE

item.title: Books
item.description: Our donation packages include the following wonderful books related to Down syndrome. We’ll Paint the Octopus Red, by Stephanie Stuve-Bodeen 47 Strings: Tessa’s Special Code, by Becky Carey You Are Enough: A Book about Inclusion, by Margaret O’Hair My Friend Isabelle, by Eliza Woloson

item.title: Dolls
item.description: Our donation packages include this wonderful doll from a company called Miniland. It’s important to us that all children have access to dolls that look like them, so we include dolls of different races and genders with each donation.
